At Welly station . So many bogans :) need to kill 30 mins before my train tho.

@KevinRobertshaw ib. Shithouse.

@marklincoln I’ve been trying to learn animate cc. Totally average at everything else too. But top level works for basic shit.

@traskjd @raygunio Thats the spirit! Although…I’m more of fan of this.. https://t.co/ADC5T11s1c

@beekaynz @melbailey Seems common now for the little ones teachers to job share? My boy had 3 different ones last year.
Went to different cafe today for lunch for work catchup. The WORST service. Went across the road to my usual…welcomed with open arms.
@marklincoln and the winner is....🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉
@ZhengRaygun 2 years of cooking school:) advanced cert in hospital, tourism and cookery- majoring in professional cookery:)
@ZhengRaygun yeah it's great fun! Brought back memories of polytechnic cooking school and making mountains of Italian tomato sauce:)
@zhengraygun Love these posts. The pasta machine one is cool. I had my boys making taglitelle over the holidays with my seldom used machine!
@marklincoln @mailchimp Just checking this out now…looks pretty cool.
@Stockhausens not a screwy plugin causing issues?
@marklincoln oooo...what's the newie gonna be?

Stoked to see a friend today in Cuba street that I first met in 97:) such a long time ago!
@theunfocused @Pseudony_Ms @Katieshould front loader ftw. Waaay better on clothes, plus as said less water too.
@scarfacelaws I saw a few hardy souls dressed up but nothing compared to the carnage when I lived there in '08. Very tame.
@scarfacelaws I'd say you're probably having a larger night than the sevens supporters I saw today in Welly....
Son now bathed, storied and in bed. Wife still out the farm with eldest. Wine time. Excuse the filthy glass. https://t.co/9vR7OodpSR
@scarfacelaws just enough scone to hold the cream.

Awesome day in Welly, caught up with dad, coffee at Eastbourne and a spot of sushi in town. Plus I got to check out @DeadpanDuck creation!
@phil_wheeler My 5 year old cranks the fan up, but will also want a hot water bottle. #kids #kiwisummer
@wardrobeflair Clearly not spilling any wine…it doesn’t stand a chance of missing the mouth. #sassy #turdigonewild
Off to Welly tomorrow with smallest Pinkham. Catching up with my dad:) look out Welly! 👀

Tunes so far today from Stuck Mojo, The Vandals and Face to Face. Best be finding my chain wallet and skateboard!

OOoosh. My body is feeling that first game of tennis in a month last night. #oldmanaaron
My Twitter is just a big clusterfuck of Trumpness at the moment. Taking the gloss off it tbh.
